member.name: Pen.Clone
member.summary: The Pen.Clone method copies aPen object.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to the new Pen object.

member.name: Pen.GetAlignment
member.summary: The Pen.GetAlignment method gets the alignment currently set for thisPen object.
member.returns: This method returns an element of the enumeration that indicates the current alignment setting for this Pen object.

member.name: Pen.GetBrush
member.summary: The Pen.GetBrush method gets the Brush object that is currently set for thisPen object.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to a Brush object that is currently used to fill a line.

member.name: Pen.GetColor
member.summary: The Pen.GetColor method gets the color currently set for thisPen object.
member.param: Pointer to a Color object that receives the color of thisPen object.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.GetCompoundArray
member.summary: The Pen.GetCompoundArray method gets the compound array currently set for thisPen object.
member.param: Pointer to an array that receives the compound array.
Integer that specifies the number of elements in thecompoundArray array.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.GetCompoundArrayCount
member.summary: The Pen.GetCompoundArrayCount method gets the number of elements in a compound array.
member.returns: This method returns an integer that indicates the number of elements in the compound array.

member.name: Pen.GetCustomEndCap
member.summary: The Pen.GetCustomEndCap method gets the custom end cap currently set for thisPen object.
member.param: Pointer to aCustomLineCap object that receives the custom end cap of thisPen object.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.GetCustomStartCap
member.summary: The Pen.GetCustomStartCap method gets the custom start cap currently set for thisPen object.
member.param: Pointer to aCustomLineCap object that receives the start cap of thisPen object.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.GetDashCap
member.summary: The Pen.GetDashCap method gets the dash cap style currently set for thisPen object.
member.returns: This method returns an element of the enumeration that indicates the dash cap style currently set for thisPen object.

member.name: Pen.GetDashOffset
member.summary: The Pen.GetDashOffset method gets the distance from the start of the line to the start of the first space in a dashed line.
member.returns: This method returns a real number that indicates the distance from the start of the line to the start of the dashes.

member.name: Pen.GetDashPattern
member.summary: The Pen.GetDashPattern method gets an array of custom dashes and spaces currently set for thisPen object.
member.param: Pointer to an array that receives the length of the dashes and spaces in a custom dashed line.
Integer that specifies the number of elements in thedashArray array.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.GetDashPatternCount
member.summary: The Pen.GetDashPatternCount method gets the number of elements in a dash pattern array.
member.returns: This method returns an integer that indicates the number of elements in the dash pattern array.

member.name: Pen.GetDashStyle
member.summary: The Pen.GetDashStyle method gets the dash style currently set for thisPen object.
member.returns: This method returns an element of the enumeration that indicates the dash style for thisPen object.

member.name: Pen.GetEndCap
member.summary: The Pen.GetEndCap method gets the end cap currently set for thisPen object.
member.returns: This method returns an element of the enumeration that indicates the end cap for thisPen object.

member.name: Pen.GetLastStatus
member.summary: The Pen.GetLastStatus method returns a value that indicates the nature of thisPen object's most recent method failure.

returns.para: The Pen.GetLastStatus method returns an element of the enumeration.
If no methods invoked on thisPen object have failed since the previous call to Pen.GetLastStatus, then Pen.GetLastStatus returns Ok.
If at least one method invoked on thisPen object has failed since the previous call to Pen.GetLastStatus, then Pen.GetLastStatus returns a value that indicates the nature of the most recent failure.

member.name: Pen.GetLineJoin
member.summary: The Pen.GetLineJoin method gets the line join style currently set for thisPen object.
member.returns: This method returns an element of the enumeration that indicates the style used at the point where line segments join.

member.name: Pen.GetMiterLimit
member.summary: The Pen.GetMiterLimit method gets the miter length currently set for thisPen object.
member.returns: This method returns a real number that indicates the miter limit of thisPen object.

member.name: Pen.GetPenType
member.summary: The Pen.GetPenType method gets the type currently set for thisPen object.
member.returns: This method returns an element of the enumeration that indicates the style of pen currently set for thisPen object.

member.name: Pen.GetStartCap
member.summary: The Pen.GetStartCap method gets the start cap currently set for thisPen object.
member.returns: This method returns an element of the enumeration that specifies the start cap for thisPen object.

member.name: Pen.GetTransform
member.summary: The Pen.GetTransform method gets the world transformation matrix currently set for thisPen object.
member.param: Pointer to a Matrix object that receives the transformation matrix.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.GetWidth
member.summary: The Pen.GetWidth method gets the width currently set for thisPen object.
member.returns: This method returns a real number that indicates the width of thisPen object.

member.name: Pen.MultiplyTransform
member.summary: The Pen.MultiplyTransform method updates the world transformation matrix of thisPen object with the product of itself and another matrix.
member.param: Pointer to a Matrix object that is multiplied with the world transformation matrix of thisPen object.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of the multiplication. MatrixOrderPrepend specifies that the passed matrix is on the left, and MatrixOrderAppend specifies that the passed matrix is on the right. The default value is MatrixOrderPrepend.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.Pen
member.summary: Creates a Pen object that uses the attributes of a brush and a real number to set the width of this Pen object.
member.param: Pointer to a brush to base this pen on.

Optional. Real number that specifies the width of this pen's stroke. The default value is 1.0. If this value is 0, the width in device units is always 1 pixel, except that the width will not be affected by scale-transform operations that are in effect for the Graphics object that the is used for; the width will always be 1 pixel.

member.name: Pen.Pen
member.summary: Creates a Pen object that uses a specified color and width.
member.param: Reference to a Color object that specifies the color for this Pen object.

Optional. Real number that specifies the width of this pen's stroke. The default value is 1.0. If this value is 0, the width in device units is always 1 pixel, except that the width will not be affected by scale-transform operations that are in effect for the Graphics object that the is used for; the width will always be 1 pixel.

member.name: Pen.ResetTransform
member.summary: The Pen.ResetTransform method sets the world transformation matrix of thisPen object to the identity matrix.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of theOk enumeration.

member.name: Pen.RotateTransform
member.summary: The Pen.RotateTransform method updates the world transformation matrix of thisPen object with the product of itself and a rotation matrix.
member.param: Real number that specifies the angle of rotation in degrees.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of the multiplication. MatrixOrderPrepend specifies that the rotation matrix is on the left, and MatrixOrderAppend specifies that the rotation matrix is on the right. The default value is MatrixOrderPrepend.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.ScaleTransform
member.summary: The Pen.ScaleTransform method sets thePen object's world transformation matrix equal to the product of itself and a scaling matrix.
member.param: Real number that specifies the horizontal scaling factor in the scaling matrix.
Real number that specifies the vertical scaling factor in the scaling matrix.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of the multiplication. MatrixOrderPrepend specifies that the scaling matrix is on the left, and MatrixOrderAppend specifies that the scaling matrix is on the right. The default value is MatrixOrderPrepend.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetAlignment
member.summary: The Pen.SetAlignment method sets the alignment for thisPen object relative to the line.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the alignment setting of the pen relative to the line that is drawn. The default value is PenAlignmentCenter.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetBrush
member.summary: The Pen.SetBrush method sets the Brush object that a pen uses to fill a line.
member.param: Pointer to a Brush object for the pen to use to fill a line.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetColor
member.summary: The Pen.SetColor method sets the color for thisPen object.
member.param: Reference to a Color object that specifies the color for thisPen object.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetCompoundArray
member.summary: The Pen.SetCompoundArray method sets the compound array for thisPen object.
member.param: Pointer to an array of real numbers that specifies the compound array. The elements in the array must be in increasing order, not less than 0, and not greater than 1.
Positive even integer that specifies the number of elements in thecompoundArray array. The integer must not be greater than the number of elements in the compound array.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetCustomEndCap
member.summary: The Pen.SetCustomEndCap method sets the custom end cap for thisPen object.
member.param: Pointer to aCustomLineCap object that specifies the custom end cap for thisPen object.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetCustomStartCap
member.summary: The Pen.SetCustomStartCap method sets the custom start cap for thisPen object.
member.param: Pointer to aCustomLineCap object that specifies the custom start cap for thisPen object.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetDashCap
member.summary: The Pen.SetDashCap method sets the dash cap style for thisPen object.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the dash cap for thisPen object.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetDashOffset
member.summary: The Pen.SetDashOffset method sets the distance from the start of the line to the start of the first dash in a dashed line.
member.param: Real number that specifies the number of times to shift the spaces in a dashed line. Each shift is equal to the length of a space in the dashed line.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetDashPattern
member.summary: The Pen.SetDashPattern method sets an array of custom dashes and spaces for thisPen object.
member.param: Pointer to an array of real numbers that specifies the length of the custom dashes and spaces. All elements in the array must be positive real numbers.
Integer that specifies the number of elements in thedashArray array. The integer must be greater than 0 and not greater than the total number of elements in the array.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetDashStyle
member.summary: The Pen.SetDashStyle method sets the dash style for thisPen object.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the dash style for thisPen object.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetEndCap
member.summary: The Pen.SetEndCap method sets the end cap for thisPen object.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the end cap of a line.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetLineCap
member.summary: The Pen.SetLineCap method sets the cap styles for the start, end, and dashes in a line drawn with this pen.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the start cap of a line.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the end cap of a line.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the start and end caps of the dashes in a dashed line.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetLineJoin
member.summary: The Pen.SetLineJoin method sets the line join for thisPen object.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the join style used at the end of a line segment that meets another line segment.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetMiterLimit
member.summary: The Pen.SetMiterLimit method sets the miter limit of thisPen object.
member.param: Real number that specifies the miter limit of thisPen object. A real number value that is less than 1.0f will be replaced with 1.0f.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetStartCap
member.summary: The Pen.SetStartCap method sets the start cap for thisPen object.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the start cap of a line.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetTransform
member.summary: The Pen.SetTransform method sets the world transformation of thisPen object.
member.param: Pointer to a Matrix object that specifies the world transformation.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.SetWidth
member.summary: The Pen.SetWidth method sets the width for thisPen object.
member.param: Real number that specifies the width of the pen.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Pen.TranslateTransform
member.summary: The Pen.TranslateTransform method sets thePen object's world transformation matrix equal to the product of itself and a scaling matrix.
member.param: Real number that specifies the horizontal scaling factor in the scaling matrix.
Real number that specifies the vertical scaling factor in the scaling matrix.

Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the order of the multiplication. MatrixOrderPrepend specifies that the scaling matrix is on the left, and MatrixOrderAppend specifies that the scaling matrix is on the right. The default value is MatrixOrderPrepend.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.
